data.title: Sport and Physical Activity at UWS
data.meta_description: At UWS we recognise the transformative power of physical activity and sport in enabling health and wellbeing. University is an exciting time in your life and we are here to help you make the most of this experience and to provide opportunities to ensure you keep your body active as well as your mind.
data.text:
UWS Sport operate a gym within the Lanarkshire Campus. It’s located in Building 1 on the ground floor next to the Restaurant and benefits from an exciting fitness suite and group fitness areas. The gym offers a wide range of equipment, and our staff are on hand to help you reach your fitness goals. The gym and fitness classes are available for all to use, you don't need to be a UWS student or a member of staff, everyone is welcome. The gym caters for all fitness interests and abilities.

All UWS students and staff benefit from free membership. Other facility users can access the gyms using a pay-as-you-go model, or if you intend on using the gym on a regular basis we have a range of memberships starting from just £14 per month.

MEMBERSHIPS

University of the West of Scotland welcomes our students, staff and wider community to access our gym facilities. The University provides FREE membership to all students and staff. UWS Sport also offers amazing value memberships for the wider community.

Facilities and Equipment

Our Lanarkshire Campus Gym has superb facilities to enable you to reach your fitness goals. It has a fully equipped cardiovascular and fixed resistance area, functional training zone and strength & conditioning area. It also has areas for our instructor led group fitness classes.

Facilities also include modern onsite changing and shower facilities. Free car parking is also available.

OPENING HOURS

Opening times are below:

Monday - Friday: 7.30am – 8.30pm

Saturday & Sunday: 9am - 1pm

CONTACT US

You can get in touch with our team via:
